legal_basis: s. 6 of the Patented Medicines (Notice of Compliance) Regulations
decision_outcome: Abbott's application for a prohibition order was granted
technical_details: Nu-Pharm's process uses higher temperatures without acetone
acetone is not essential for industrial-scale production
expert_testimony: affidavits, cross-examinations, and patents to assess chemical equivalence
patent_validity: deemed an obvious chemical equivalent of the '151 patent
cause_of_action: preventing Nu-Pharm from obtaining regulatory approval for divalproex sodium before the '151 patent expired
